data.title: 24 final: Know El Clasico match time and watch live streaming in India
data.meta_description: It’s Barcelona vs Real Madrid in the Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final on Monday. Know match schedule, El Clasico time and where to watch live streaming in India.
data.text:
Barcelona and Real Madrid will lock horns in the Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final at the King Saud University Stadium in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, on Sunday. The Real Madrid vs Barcelona El Clasico clash, which kicks off in the early hours of Monday. It will be live streamed in India.

Supercopa de Espana, or the Spanish Super Cup, is a Spanish football tournament which has been running since 1982. Barcelona, 14-time champions, are the most successful team in the competition’s history, closely followed by Real Madrid, who have won the trophy 12 times.

The Catalans are also the reigning champions, having beaten Real 3-1 in the final, also played at Riyadh, last year.

Barcelona secured their spot in the Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final by defeating Osasuna 2-0 in the semi-final. Goals from Robert Lewandowski and Lamine Yamal sealed the victory, setting the stage for a mouth-watering El Clasico final.

The Carlo Ancelotti-coached Real Madrid team, meanwhile, beat city rivals Atletico Madrid in a tightly-contested semi-final clash. The match was tied at 3-3 after regulation time before goals from Joselu and Brahim Diaz decided the fixture in extra time.

The Real Madrid vs Barcelona clash promises to be a star-studded affair with the Los Blancos boasting of top talents like Jude Bellingham, Toni Kroos and Vinicius Junior while Barcelona have the likes of Ferran Torres, Lewandowski and Pedri in their ranks.

Barcelona vs Real Madrid Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final start time in India

The Barcelona vs Real Madrid Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final starts from 12:30 AM on Monday, January 15, in India.

Where to watch Barcelona vs Real Madrid Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final live in India

Live streaming of the Barcelona vs Real Madrid in the Supercopa de Espana 2023-24 final will be available on Fancode in India. There is no live telecast of the Spanish Super Cup final on any TV channel in India.
